tokenized_answer: The meeting was mainly about the exchange of the preliminary ideas about a new TV remote control project.
They first got used to the writeboard and drew some animals with it.Project manager wanted to sell this remote control for twenty five Euro and expected profit will be around fifty million Euro.
Afterwards the team raised different opinions about features of the new remote controls and related questions about market potential.
Among all the features, having a good look and size were unanimously considered to be the most essential.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the group's plan of their marketing strategy.
tokenized_answer: They want to keep the cost under 12.50 euros by controlling the materials, and they want to sell them internationally for 25 euros, with a target of 50 million euros worldwide.
So they wanted the remote to be compatible with most TVS in the world, or at least all the TVS they make.

tokenized_answer: The team decided that the remote had to be compatible with most of the world's TVS, or at least the ones they made.
